traits.name: False Appearance
entries: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The statue makes five attacks: one with its headbutt and four with its lightning bolt blades.

actions.name: Headbutt
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Bolt Blades
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4 damage) slashing damage.
